key_themes: Technical breakdown in secondary sectors (SaaS, retail, streaming)
Banking sector stress and credit vulnerabilities
risk_factors: Technical breakdown accelerating below SPX 6816 support signaling Wave 4 correction
Legislative disappointment on digital asset regulation deflating crypto positioning
Cryptocurrency exchange security breaches reversing institutional adoption momentum
Banking sector capital adequacy stress and credit spread widening
Geopolitical escalation (semiconductor trade restrictions, Iran/Taiwan tensions) creating headline risk
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Watch $680 active support (77k OI) and $685 Max Pain gravitational pull. QQQ: Testing $620 Call Wall resistance (38k OI, 1.1% away) with $618 Max Pain anchor. /ES: 6816 support per Twitter critical for maintaining uptrend
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Upside toward $700 resistance (49k OI), downside risk accelerates below $680 toward $640 (100k OI). QQQ: Break above $620 opens $625-$630 zone, failure brings $590 support test (78k OI). /ES: Hold above 6816 maintains bullish structure, break targets 6550 per Twitter
